summary: 50 days of Andi Mack
body:
50 days of Andi Mack

Season 1 Episode 10: Home Away from Home

  • “The wifi is coffee shop guest” Now that is something I can relate to
  • Cece breaking down about Andi and Bex not wanting to live with her was heartbreaking
  • “HeY hEy”
  • Buffy calling Amber “the next Steve Jobs”
  • “It should just be the two of us. It’s what Amber would have wanted” Amber? Really?
  • “It’s just you and me, broh. Go sports!”
  • Bex said she came to apologise but SHE NEVER APOLOGISED
  • I love how it was made to sound like Andi was cheating on Bex
  • I actually wanted to kill Jonah when Cyrus’ face dropped seeing him without the jacket

summary: Why is there nothing about Buffy being black
question: Why is there nothing about Buffy being black
answer:
I was originally going to make one for Buffy but I couldn’t find any occasion insinuating race other than the Buffy hair plot line in 1x05. Other than that, we have had a few good black representations such as Kira, Walker, Pat Driscoll and Buffy herself which are commendable. I just wished they provided us with more storylines pertaining to her race and issues she faces as a young black woman. 

But aside from that, you’re totally right, there is someone out there who saw the 1x05 plot line of hair in the black community, saw themselves within Buffy’s character and that should be celebrated. So I present to you an addition.

Andi Mack Diversity Appreciation Week: Race

But aside from that, you’re totally right, there is someone out there who saw the 1x05 plot line of hair in the black community, saw themselves within Buffy’s character and that should be celebrated. So I present to you an addition.

Andi Mack Diversity Appreciation Week: Race

blog.name: tyrusoldme-am-spoilers
blog.title: Theodore James is the ONLY correct answer

summary: Achromatic: Tyrus- Part 1
body:
Achromatic: Tyrus- Part 1

TJ and Cyrus’s lockers are a few lockers apart. They always talk to each other as if they are miles away, and even though everyone around them gets tired of it, they never do. TJ Kippen, basketball enthusiast, calmly walked up to his locker to throw in his science binder and grab his one for English. He was calm until his eye caught Cyrus Goodman: not a disaster enthusiast, just disaster. He was running on 3 hours of sleep, a migraine, two caramel macchiatos, and a can of Red Bull. How he’s alive? Who knows. Cyrus is trying to get his locker open, and quick to the rescue, TJ Kippen is there to sweep his prince off his feet. TJ dropped his binder on the floor and helped Cyrus.

TJ: “Hey, do you need help?”

Cyrus: “Actually yeah, that would be greatly appreciated.”

TJ: “Alright, what’s your combination?”

Cyrus: “My birthday.”

TJ punches in the combination but no luck.

Cyrus: “Hang on, let me try again.”

Once again Cyrus tries but nothing. His frustration kicks in and he’s flooring “his” locker.

TJ: “Here, let me help.”

As Cyrus is angrily throwing numbers into the lock, TJ shyly throws his hand onto Cyrus’ hand.

A red storm sweeps across TJ’s face and moves onto Cyrus’.

TJ: “Sorry Cyrus, I touched your Cyrus- uHH I mean your sand- wAIT nO! Wow! I’m making SUCH a foOl of myself RIGHT NOW! TJ I’m sorry for- wait no I’m TJ YOURE TYRUS! GOD NO WAIT I-“

Flustered, TJ dipped, picking up his binder and leaving a confused Cyrus behind.

Cyrus doesn’t know what just happened but he shakes it off and tries to open his locker again.

Cyrus: “Ugh!”

He looks up.

Cyrus: “Come ON, locker 307- wait 307 is TJ’s loc- oh god. Oh god oh god oh god OH MY GOD OH MY GOD OH MY GOD!!!! I’ve been trying to open TJ’s locker this whole- wait but he knew it was his locker…. Why would he help me open his OWN locker that doesn’t make any sense. Maybe he’s tired like me? Maybe he’s distracted? There is a game next week wait no TJ is benched for that game after he locked Metcalf’s door and played music on the speakers.”

Cyrus laughed, letting the memory absorb his thoughts.

Cyrus: “All you could hear was WHO LET THE DOGS WHO WHO WHO WHO WHO LET THE DOGS OUT WHO WHO WHO WHO that was a good prank but he’s benched so the game isn’t distracting him and I can’t think of anything else so it must be fatigue- it has to be…. Right?”

Confused, Cyrus moved to his locker and wondered about TJ.

Meanwhile: TJ

TJ was feeling all kinds of emotions: he felt like the world’s biggest idiot, he felt anxious, frustrated, confused, and embarrassed.

What must Cyrus think of me now? Why was I feeling so nervous? Cyrus and I have been friends for months and I’ve always felt the same way…. Right? No, not right. Definitely not right. Ever since we made up after the gun incident I’ve felt…. Diffrent around Cyrus. I felt like I was gonna throw up. My stomach might implode and my heart might combust! Ever since that day at the swings, I’ve felt…. I don’t know. I really don’t know. I’ve been feeling different. TJ is more confused than ever. He’s not sure what he’s feeling, but he wants to throw up.

Marty: “Earth to TJ?”

TJ: “What? Oh hey!”

Marty: “Are you okay?”

TJ: “ Yeah! I’m fine, why do you ask?”

Marty: “You’ve been in the bathroom for ten minutes mumbling something about your heart throwing up and your stomach exploding when you see…. Papyrus?”

TJ: “That’s not even close to what I was thin- wait what have you been doing in here for the last 10 minutes?”

Marty: “Well, it’s the bathroom, which means you do anything but actually go to the bathroom. So since I stole Buffy’s lipstick earlier, I wrote ‘Mr. The Party’ on the mirror, then I ate my sandwich, then I drank my juice, then I-“

TJ: “Alright I get it. Bye Marty.”

Marty: “Where are you going?”

TJ: “To make things right.”

Marty: “Oh with that papyrus plant? I’m not sure where you found papyrus in Shadyside I mean it’s only available in exotic places like Sears.”

TJ: “Did you just- Marty there is a Sears in the mall like 30 minutes away- I’m sorry that’s exotic? Marty you seriously have like (1) one brain cell.”

Marty: “Dawg, what’s a brain cell?”

TJ: “Oh dear GOD I rest my case. Goodbye hopefully forever Marty.”

TJ left the bathroom feeling sorry for Marty’s parents.

Marty: “I don’t know why homie left I was gonna show him my second sandwich.”

Anyway….

TJ clutched his binder since the comfort of Cyrus’s hand was not an option. He made his way to his locker hoping to see Cyrus. Fortunately, Cyrus was at his locker.

Cyrus: “Okay, what was that?”

TJ: “I don’t know.”

Cyrus: “That’s all you have to say?”

TJ: “Why are you so mad?”

Cyrus: “I’m sorry, I didn’t mean to sound mad.”

TJ: “Oh.”

TJ averted his gaze. This was all becoming too real, he didn’t think this through he just wanted to leave Marty. He wasn’t ready to talk about what he’s feeling yet- whatever, he’s feeling, he wasn’t sure.

Cyrus: “TJ. I-“

Cyrus let out a deep breath.

Cyrus: “I feel different around you.”

TJ: “I feel diffrent around you too.”

There was a pause.

TJ and Cyrus: “Ever since that day at the swings I don’t know…. I have just felt.. Different.”

Both boys let out a sigh of relief.

TJ: “How do you feel diffrent?”

Cyrus: “I feel…. Happier. You?”

TJ: “I feel happier too.”

That was a lie. He didn’t know what he felt.

Cyrus smiled.

Cyrus: “I have to go.”

TJ: “Oh? Where if you don’t mind me asking.”

Cyrus: “I have a doctors appointment.”

TJ: “Okay! Well, I’ll text you later.”

Cyrus: “See you!”

Cyrus skipped happily away. TJ stood by his locker, smiling over Cyrus. He switched binders and began to walk to lunch when he stepped on something. He looked down and it was a key with ‘Cyrus’ engraved on it.

TJ: “Oh no. Cyrus! Cyrus! You dropped this!”

TJ ran near the front of the school to be washed away by a wave of emotions. His eyes reflected a sight he could never unsee. Cyrus Goodman wrapped in the arms of another boy. A boy that isn’t TJ.


Sorry this took so long- I was reading Twitter AU’s

Cyrus: “I’m sorry, I didn’t mean to sound mad.”

TJ: “Oh.”

TJ averted his gaze. This was all becoming too real, he didn’t think this through he just wanted to leave Marty. He wasn’t ready to talk about what he’s feeling yet- whatever, he’s feeling, he wasn’t sure.

Cyrus: “TJ. I-“

Cyrus let out a deep breath.

Cyrus: “I feel different around you.”

TJ: “I feel diffrent around you too.”

There was a pause.

TJ and Cyrus: “Ever since that day at the swings I don’t know…. I have just felt.. Different.”

Both boys let out a sigh of relief.

TJ: “How do you feel diffrent?”

Cyrus: “I feel…. Happier. You?”

TJ: “I feel happier too.”

That was a lie. He didn’t know what he felt.

Cyrus smiled.

Cyrus: “I have to go.”

TJ: “Oh? Where if you don’t mind me asking.”

Cyrus: “I have a doctors appointment.”

TJ: “Okay! Well, I’ll text you later.”

Cyrus: “See you!”

Cyrus skipped happily away. TJ stood by his locker, smiling over Cyrus. He switched binders and began to walk to lunch when he stepped on something. He looked down and it was a key with ‘Cyrus’ engraved on it.

TJ: “Oh no. Cyrus! Cyrus! You dropped this!”

TJ ran near the front of the school to be washed away by a wave of emotions. His eyes reflected a sight he could never unsee. Cyrus Goodman wrapped in the arms of another boy. A boy that isn’t TJ.


Sorry this took so long- I was reading Twitter AU’s
trail.content:
Achromatic: Tyrus- Part 1

TJ and Cyrus’s lockers are a few lockers apart. They always talk to each other as if they are miles away, and even though everyone around them gets tired of it, they never do. TJ Kippen, basketball enthusiast, calmly walked up to his locker to throw in his science binder and grab his one for English. He was calm until his eye caught Cyrus Goodman: not a disaster enthusiast, just disaster. He was running on 3 hours of sleep, a migraine, two caramel macchiatos, and a can of Red Bull. How he’s alive? Who knows. Cyrus is trying to get his locker open, and quick to the rescue, TJ Kippen is there to sweep his prince off his feet. TJ dropped his binder on the floor and helped Cyrus.

TJ: “Hey, do you need help?”

Cyrus: “Actually yeah, that would be greatly appreciated.”

TJ: “Alright, what’s your combination?”

Cyrus: “My birthday.”

TJ punches in the combination but no luck.

Cyrus: “Hang on, let me try again.”

Once again Cyrus tries but nothing. His frustration kicks in and he’s flooring “his” locker.

TJ: “Here, let me help.”

As Cyrus is angrily throwing numbers into the lock, TJ shyly throws his hand onto Cyrus’ hand.

A red storm sweeps across TJ’s face and moves onto Cyrus’.

TJ: “Sorry Cyrus, I touched your Cyrus- uHH I mean your sand- wAIT nO! Wow! I’m making SUCH a foOl of myself RIGHT NOW! TJ I’m sorry for- wait no I’m TJ YOURE TYRUS! GOD NO WAIT I-“

Flustered, TJ dipped, picking up his binder and leaving a confused Cyrus behind.

Cyrus doesn’t know what just happened but he shakes it off and tries to open his locker again.

Cyrus: “Ugh!”

He looks up.

Cyrus: “Come ON, locker 307- wait 307 is TJ’s loc- oh god. Oh god oh god oh god OH MY GOD OH MY GOD OH MY GOD!!!! I’ve been trying to open TJ’s locker this whole- wait but he knew it was his locker…. Why would he help me open his OWN locker that doesn’t make any sense. Maybe he’s tired like me? Maybe he’s distracted? There is a game next week wait no TJ is benched for that game after he locked Metcalf’s door and played music on the speakers.”

Cyrus laughed, letting the memory absorb his thoughts.

Cyrus: “All you could hear was WHO LET THE DOGS WHO WHO WHO WHO WHO LET THE DOGS OUT WHO WHO WHO WHO that was a good prank but he’s benched so the game isn’t distracting him and I can’t think of anything else so it must be fatigue- it has to be…. Right?”

Confused, Cyrus moved to his locker and wondered about TJ.

Meanwhile: TJ

TJ was feeling all kinds of emotions: he felt like the world’s biggest idiot, he felt anxious, frustrated, confused, and embarrassed.

What must Cyrus think of me now? Why was I feeling so nervous? Cyrus and I have been friends for months and I’ve always felt the same way…. Right? No, not right. Definitely not right. Ever since we made up after the gun incident I’ve felt…. Diffrent around Cyrus. I felt like I was gonna throw up. My stomach might implode and my heart might combust! Ever since that day at the swings, I’ve felt…. I don’t know. I really don’t know. I’ve been feeling different. TJ is more confused than ever. He’s not sure what he’s feeling, but he wants to throw up.

Marty: “Earth to TJ?”

TJ: “What? Oh hey!”

Marty: “Are you okay?”

TJ: “ Yeah! I’m fine, why do you ask?”

Marty: “You’ve been in the bathroom for ten minutes mumbling something about your heart throwing up and your stomach exploding when you see…. Papyrus?”

TJ: “That’s not even close to what I was thin- wait what have you been doing in here for the last 10 minutes?”

Marty: “Well, it’s the bathroom, which means you do anything but actually go to the bathroom. So since I stole Buffy’s lipstick earlier, I wrote ‘Mr. The Party’ on the mirror, then I ate my sandwich, then I drank my juice, then I-“

TJ: “Alright I get it. Bye Marty.”

Marty: “Where are you going?”

TJ: “To make things right.”

Marty: “Oh with that papyrus plant? I’m not sure where you found papyrus in Shadyside I mean it’s only available in exotic places like Sears.”

TJ: “Did you just- Marty there is a Sears in the mall like 30 minutes away- I’m sorry that’s exotic? Marty you seriously have like (1) one brain cell.”

Marty: “Dawg, what’s a brain cell?”

TJ: “Oh dear GOD I rest my case. Goodbye hopefully forever Marty.”

TJ left the bathroom feeling sorry for Marty’s parents.

Marty: “I don’t know why homie left I was gonna show him my second sandwich.”

Anyway….

TJ clutched his binder since the comfort of Cyrus’s hand was not an option. He made his way to his locker hoping to see Cyrus. Fortunately, Cyrus was at his locker.

Cyrus: “Okay, what was that?”

TJ: “I don’t know.”

Cyrus: “That’s all you have to say?”

TJ: “Why are you so mad?”

Cyrus: “I’m sorry, I didn’t mean to sound mad.”

TJ: “Oh.”

TJ averted his gaze. This was all becoming too real, he didn’t think this through he just wanted to leave Marty. He wasn’t ready to talk about what he’s feeling yet- whatever, he’s feeling, he wasn’t sure.

Cyrus: “TJ. I-“

Cyrus let out a deep breath.

Cyrus: “I feel different around you.”

TJ: “I feel diffrent around you too.”

There was a pause.

TJ and Cyrus: “Ever since that day at the swings I don’t know…. I have just felt.. Different.”

Both boys let out a sigh of relief.

TJ: “How do you feel diffrent?”

Cyrus: “I feel…. Happier. You?”

TJ: “I feel happier too.”

That was a lie. He didn’t know what he felt.

Cyrus smiled.

Cyrus: “I have to go.”

TJ: “Oh? Where if you don’t mind me asking.”

Cyrus: “I have a doctors appointment.”

TJ: “Okay! Well, I’ll text you later.”

Cyrus: “See you!”

Cyrus skipped happily away. TJ stood by his locker, smiling over Cyrus. He switched binders and began to walk to lunch when he stepped on something. He looked down and it was a key with ‘Cyrus’ engraved on it.

TJ: “Oh no. Cyrus! Cyrus! You dropped this!”

TJ ran near the front of the school to be washed away by a wave of emotions. His eyes reflected a sight he could never unsee. Cyrus Goodman wrapped in the arms of another boy. A boy that isn’t TJ.

tags: tj and his one-track cyrus-obsessed mind
summary:
Officer, to TJ, Jonah and Marty: You kids are under arrest for attempting to carry three people on a single motorbike.
TJ,...
body:
Officer, to TJ, Jonah and Marty: You kids are under arrest for attempting to carry three people on a single motorbike.

TJ, freezing: Wait … Did you … Did you just say THREE people??

Officer: Yes. That is what I said.

TJ, paling: Oh no … Oh nononononno oh my god this can’t be happening … Please tell me this isn’t happening *turns around and checks* OH MY GOD

TJ, on full-blown panic-mode now, pulling at his hair anxiously: SHIT

Officer: Uh … Is everything okay, ki–?

TJ, shoving Jonah and Marty off the motorbike and frantically revving the engine: CYRUS FELL OFF

summary: can we donate to help pay for your josh tattoo? 👀
question: can we donate to help pay for your josh tattoo? 👀
answer:
I’ve been getting a lot of asks over the last few months in which people are either saying that I should get paid for the work I do on this blog, or people wanting to donate because of my personal financial situation, or just nice asks like this one! 

Because so much of my time is spent working on things for this blog/fandom, whether it be writing essays, answering questions, doing my DCOM reviews, working on the paper cranes, etc. - I have decided to reopen my “buy me a coffee” page. That way if anyone is interested in helping me out or showing appreciation for my work with compensation, etc. you can do so without feeling pressure or anything.

For now - anything I get is going to be saved specifically for me to get my Andi Mack tattoo (hopefully before the finale airs) but it’ll also help out with my general life expenses. I’ll link it in this post but the link will also eventually be in my bio here and on twitter: 

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/disneymack

blog.description:

summary: why do half the fandom hate jandi so much? I've recently catch up on the episodes and Pey and Asher do have a lot chemistry and...
question: why do half the fandom hate jandi so much? I've recently catch up on the episodes and Pey and Asher do have a lot chemistry and I feel like the problems they faced when they were together back then are very common around people their age. I don't think it's fair to just completely shut down opportunities for the couple to redeem itself, specially now that they've grown and matured and probably wouldn't make the same mistakes
answer:
I can’t speak for everyone in the fandom, but I can speak for myself! 

I actually loved what we saw with Jandi in the early days of the show. Andi’s crush on him was so realistic and perfectly reminded me of what it was like to be 13. When I eventually get around to rewatching the series and hopefully making discussion videos about it, this is something I want to talk more about since it happened prior to this blog existing and people don’t really discuss the events of season 1 a lot. I don’t hate Jandi because of their mistakes or the problems they faced. I still think all of that was incredibly realistic and well-done from a human perspective. However, from a story-telling perspective, I think that having the two characters end up in a romantic relationship would be counterproductive and unsatisfying. 

A huge part of Andi’s character development has been in her learning to stand up for herself, to be independent, and to be able to free herself from the drama of relationships. Some of her best scenes have been her freeing herself from Jonah Beck. Back in season one, when she quit the Ultimate team and ran away with an expression of pure bliss. At Cyrus’ Bar Mitzvah party, when she points out how she didn’t like feeling so obsessed with him, etc. and feels free in breaking up with him. Even how happy they were following the no-breakup-breakup. Having her end up with Jonah in the finale would just feel like backtracking and erasing all of that. 

And the thing about Jonah’s character is that he still hasn’t been given the space to be independent and to be ble to free himself from the drama of relationships. He has constantly been in some sort of relationship pretty much from the start of the show. He hasn’t been given the chance to BREATHE. And for his character development to feel complete, I think he needs to be single for awhile. Especially because his dating habits are directly connected to his mental health (he seeks comfort in romantic relationships to cope with his anxiety, which only makes his anxiety worse). He deserves to be single and to love himself. 

The characters really don’t even have romantic chemistry anymore. Andi has stood firm in the fact that she no longer has interest in Jonah, which we saw in the scene after Jamber kissed on the bench (”Mack out!”). And Jonah hasn’t shown romantic interest in anybody since Libby either, despite literally being in a relationship right now. So they’re going to have a hard time making these two fall ~in love~ again if that’s the route they take. 

I would much rather the characters end on platonic terms, with the possibility of a future together. Rather than them become official endgame. But I guess we’ll see what happens! 

I think a lot of the fanbase dislikes Jandi for reasons other than this. Some people don’t like it because they ship Jyrus or some other ship that is disrupted by Jandi being together. Some people don’t like it because they think it was rude that Andi pursued Jonah, knowing about Cyrus’ feelings. Some people are just annoyed with the drama of their relationship. Some people don’t like one or the other character involved in the ship. But for me, it’s seriously just about the character development and storytelling. But I have faith in the writers enough to wait it out and see where things go before complaining about it lmao.

reblog.comment:

I would much rather the characters end on platonic terms, with the possibility of a future together. Rather than them become official endgame. But I guess we’ll see what happens! 

I think a lot of the fanbase dislikes Jandi for reasons other than this. Some people don’t like it because they ship Jyrus or some other ship that is disrupted by Jandi being together. Some people don’t like it because they think it was rude that Andi pursued Jonah, knowing about Cyrus’ feelings. Some people are just annoyed with the drama of their relationship. Some people don’t like one or the other character involved in the ship. But for me, it’s seriously just about the character development and storytelling. But I have faith in the writers enough to wait it out and see where things go before complaining about it lmao.

trail.content_raw:
I can’t speak for everyone in the fandom, but I can speak for myself! 

I actually loved what we saw with Jandi in the early days of the show. Andi’s crush on him was so realistic and perfectly reminded me of what it was like to be 13. When I eventually get around to rewatching the series and hopefully making discussion videos about it, this is something I want to talk more about since it happened prior to this blog existing and people don’t really discuss the events of season 1 a lot. I don’t hate Jandi because of their mistakes or the problems they faced. I still think all of that was incredibly realistic and well-done from a human perspective. However, from a story-telling perspective, I think that having the two characters end up in a romantic relationship would be counterproductive and unsatisfying. 

A huge part of Andi’s character development has been in her learning to stand up for herself, to be independent, and to be able to free herself from the drama of relationships. Some of her best scenes have been her freeing herself from Jonah Beck. Back in season one, when she quit the Ultimate team and ran away with an expression of pure bliss. At Cyrus’ Bar Mitzvah party, when she points out how she didn’t like feeling so obsessed with him, etc. and feels free in breaking up with him. Even how happy they were following the no-breakup-breakup. Having her end up with Jonah in the finale would just feel like backtracking and erasing all of that. 

And the thing about Jonah’s character is that he still hasn’t been given the space to be independent and to be ble to free himself from the drama of relationships. He has constantly been in some sort of relationship pretty much from the start of the show. He hasn’t been given the chance to BREATHE. And for his character development to feel complete, I think he needs to be single for awhile. Especially because his dating habits are directly connected to his mental health (he seeks comfort in romantic relationships to cope with his anxiety, which only makes his anxiety worse). He deserves to be single and to love himself. 

The characters really don’t even have romantic chemistry anymore. Andi has stood firm in the fact that she no longer has interest in Jonah, which we saw in the scene after Jamber kissed on the bench (”Mack out!”). And Jonah hasn’t shown romantic interest in anybody since Libby either, despite literally being in a relationship right now. So they’re going to have a hard time making these two fall ~in love~ again if that’s the route they take. 

I would much rather the characters end on platonic terms, with the possibility of a future together. Rather than them become official endgame. But I guess we’ll see what happens! 

I think a lot of the fanbase dislikes Jandi for reasons other than this. Some people don’t like it because they ship Jyrus or some other ship that is disrupted by Jandi being together. Some people don’t like it because they think it was rude that Andi pursued Jonah, knowing about Cyrus’ feelings. Some people are just annoyed with the drama of their relationship. Some people don’t like one or the other character involved in the ship. But for me, it’s seriously just about the character development and storytelling. But I have faith in the writers enough to wait it out and see where things go before complaining about it lmao.
